department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Growing up in Mumbai, India where I was born, I was breezing through my Architecture Program when I got blindsided by this amazing thing called Animation. The next thing I knew, I was pursuing my Masters in Film and Animaton at Rochester Institute of Technology.<br><br>I have had the opportunity to work on games for a portable gaming system called  Play PorTT along with several commercials and DVD's for Children. My Short Films have won many awards and entered several Film festivals.<br><br>I love Music, Traveling, Hiking, Food and Off beat movies.
